content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_wool
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "evoker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 22}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 22, "index": 26}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 59, "index": 29}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]
thought: The cyan dye is needed to craft cyan wool, so I will move it into the crafting grid at slot 1.
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_wool
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "evoker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 22}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 22, "index": 26}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 59, "index": 29}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]
thought: The white wool is also needed to craft cyan wool, so I will move it into the crafting grid at slot 2.
act: move from slot 39 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_wool
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "evoker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 22}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 22, "index": 26}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 59, "index": 29}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]
thought: The cyan wool has been crafted and is ready to be moved out of the crafting grid. I will move it to slot 11.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
